Class BasicPainter

java.lang.Object
  com.jidesoft.plaf.basic.BasicPainter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.SwingConstants, ThemePainter
Direct Known Subclasses:
AquaPainter, EclipsePainter, MetalPainter, Office2003Painter
public class BasicPainter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.SwingConstants, ThemePainter

Painter for Vsnet L&F.

Please note, this class is still in development mode. Future version might break your build if you use it now.
